name: The Belmont Hotel
description: In the heart of Leicester, this elegant Victorian townhouse is less than 500 metres from the railway station. The family-run boutique-style hotel offers free parking, stylish en-suite rooms, and unlimited free WiFi. The Belmont has been a hotel since 1934. Situated in a quiet, leafy conservation area, it is only a few minutes walk from the very heart of the city centre and both university campuses. The hotel is also within easy reach of junction 21 of the M1 and the M69 motorways. The hotel has 74 bedrooms, varying in style from modern to traditional. David Ferguson's at The Belmont Restaurant offers good food and service in stylish surroundings. With a more casual atmosphere, Jamie's Bar serves light bites and coffees, as well as a range of cocktails. The Belmont also boasts facilities for functions for up to 175 people.

name: Novotel Leicester
description: Novotel Leicester is a modern and stylish 154 room hotel, offering conference space and a stylish NineB Restaurant and Bar, set in the heart of the city. The perfect destination for business and leisure guests, our Leicester hotel is close to Sports grounds, De Montford Hall, and the National Space Centre. Easy to access no matter where you're coming from, the hotel is situated within walking distance of the train station and just a short distance from the M1 and East Midlands and Birmingham Airport.accorhotels.com

name: The Gresham Aparthotel
description: Situated in Leicester, 600 metres from De Montfort University and 200 metres from the centre, The Gresham Aparthotel features air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, and a fitness centre. Each unit comes with a fully equipped kitchenette with a dining table, a flat-screen TV with streaming services and a private bathroom with shower, a hair dryer and free toiletries. A microwave, a fridge and stovetop are also offered, as well as a kettle. Leicester Railway Station is less than 1 km from the aparthotel, while University of Leicester is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is East Midlands Airport, 31 km from The Gresham Aparthotel.

name: Winstanley House
description: Set amid parkland with its illustrious history and contemporary renovation, Winstanley House is the place to be. As a boutique hotel, luxury venue and home to Black Iron, a contemporary British steakhouse and restaurant, we enjoy welcoming guests through our doors to create memories they’ll never forget. The venue is a Grade II Listed Georgian house located just outside of Leicester City Centre with 19 stunning bedrooms, two elegant ballrooms, a modern British restaurant, private dining room and beautiful terraces all set in 168 acres of rolling public parkland. Rooms are located in to two areas, the original Georgian manor where rooms are accessed via the grand staircase; and the converted coach house offering access by both lift and stairs. Please advise the hotel in advance if you require lift access. Our ballrooms and kitchens are able to entertain over 500 guests, and our 19 rooms offer luxurious stays after busy days. Please note that only brides who have their weddings at Winstanley house are permitted to enter the building in bridal wear. At the hotel, rooms include a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The rooms at Winstanley House have air conditioning and a wardrobe. The accommodation also offers a terrace with a covered area providing shade from both sun and showers, perfect for alfresco drinks with friends. You will find the hotel situated in Leicester, 3.3 km from De Montfort and Leicester University, while Belgrave Road is 6 km from the property. The nearest airport is East Midlands Airport, 25 km from the hotel. Access is gained by driving through Braunstone park to find the hotel hidden at its centre.

name: Villare Leicester City Centre hotel
description: Set in Leicester, less than 1 km from De Montfort University, Villare Leicester City Centre hotel offers accommodation with a shared lounge, private parking, a terrace and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 1.4 km from Leicester Railway Station. All guest rooms at the hotel come with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a shower. At Villare Leicester City Centre hotel all rooms have bed linen and towels. Belgrave Road is 1.9 km from the accommodation, while University of Leicester is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is East Midlands Airport, 30 km from Villare Leicester City Centre hotel.

name: Holiday Inn Leicester
description: A modern Leicester hotel near the city centre with an open lobby, meeting facilities and spacious bedrooms. Holiday Inn® Leicester hotel is located near the Highcross shopping centre and is a five minute walk from attractions such as the King Richard III Visitor Centre and Leicester Cathedral. The hotel is a 10-minute taxi ride from Leicester train station. The M1 motorway is 15 minutes drive away, and there is an NCP car park next to the hotel. The National Space Centre is a six-minute drive from the hotel. Sports fans are 10 minutes drive from Leicester Tigers rugby matches at Welford Road Stadium and the King Power Stadium, home of Leicester City FC. The striking, contemporary Curve Theatre hosts performing arts and is 15 minutes walk from the hotel. The hotel is also in close proximity to De Montfort University and the University of Leicester. The hotel's flexible spaces, from boardrooms to an event suite can host meetings and functions for up to 300 people. There's free standard Wi-Fi throughout, audio-visual equipment and catering are available.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Holiday Inn Leicester - Wigston
description: Recently refurbished, this hotel features new generation Holiday Inn rooms, perfectly located just 10-minutes from the M1 motorway and a 10-minute drive from Leicester Railway Station. 80 bedrooms including executive and family rooms, a gym, Starbucks coffee shop, Bella Italia restaurant and Stage Suites function rooms for up to 350 delegates. On site free parking for 150 cars is also available fully complimentary for all meetings, events and residents. With exceptional links to motorways, Leicester Train Station, and East Midlands Airport, Holiday Inn Leicester Wigston is the ideal location. Following a multi-million-pound refurbishment, the hotel offers 80 en-suite bedrooms, 5 conference rooms with modern facilities, restaurant, bar and 150 FREE parking for coach and cars. A newly refurbished Gym now open. The hotel's flexible spaces, from boardrooms to an event suite, can host meetings and functions for up to 350 people. There is free high-speed Wi-Fi throughout and audio-visual equipment is available. Exceptional links to motorways, Leicester Train Station and East Midlands Airport. Holiday Inn Leicester Wigston is the ideal location for a peaceful night’s sleep and close enough to the cities historical, cultural and sporting attractions, such as the Leicester Tigers Rugby Club, Leicester City Football Club, De Montfort Concert Hall, De Montfort University, Twycross Zoo and the National Space Centre to name a few.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Days Inn by Wyndham Leicester Forest East M1
address: Welcome Break Service Area J21, Leicester, LE3 3GB
description: Ideally located by M1 Motorway with Leicester, Nottingham and Milton Keynes Within one Hours Drive. DIGITAL Free view Flat screen TV with 60 plus channels in all rooms. FREE WIFI THROUGHOUT Has 3 ATM Machines, Meeting Room Facilities Suitable for up to 10 Delegates, Extra Meeting Room Suitable for up to 8 Delegates, 24 Hr Reception and Several Restaurants Nearby. Free Outside Parking, Continental Breakfast for a nominal fee per person and Full English Breakfast at per person charge. Pets accepted, for a nominal fee per stay. Free Parking.Wyndham

name: Leicester Marriott Hotel
address: Smith Way, Grove Park, Enderby, Leicester, LE19 1SW
description: Conveniently located in Enderby, minutes from the M1, the Leicester Marriott Hotel offers four-star accommodations within easy reach of Leicester city centre. The air-conditioned, stylish and smoke-free guest rooms and suites each feature a 32-inch flat-screen TV, ergonomic workstation, and luxury bedding. Executive-level rooms include complimentary Wi-Fi as well as access to an exclusive guest lounge. Open for breakfast and dinner, Market Kitchen features a menu full of wholesome and culturally inspired dishes from around the world. Guests can also enjoy a lighter meal in the Market Kitchen Bar & Lounge, which is open all day for food and drinks. The New Walk Museum and Highcross Shopping Centre are within 5 miles. Sports fans will find the Leicester Tigers, Leicester City FC, and Leicestershire County Cricket nearby.Official Hotel Information

name: ibis Leicester City
description: With a city centre location less than five minutes walk from Leicester train station, ibis Leicester City is a modern, affordable hotel in the East Midlands. Visiting family or friends in the area. Make the most of your time here with a trip to the King Richard 3 Visitor Centre, the Jewry Wall, or the fantastic National Space Centre, all within easy reach of our modern, pet-friendly hotel. Cheer on your team at Leicester City Football Club, just 10-minutes away by car.accorhotels.com

name: Ibis Budget Leicester
address: Leicester North Services, Junction A6/A46, Birstall, Leicester, LE4 3BT
description: Ahmed Durvesh, the General Manager welcomes you at ibis budget Leicester. Surrounded by all the convenience of Leicester North Services, gives easy access to M1, A46 and A6. Our affordable hotel offers a guaranteed warm welcome, offering contactless entry to your room, with flat screen TV with Chromecast, high speed Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Enjoy a hearty, unlimited continental breakfast spread (including some cooked options) each morning, relax and sip chilled draught beer with Happy Hour price eachaccorhotels.com

name: Castle Hotel by Chef & Brewer Collection
description: Originally a 17th-century farmhouse, this hotel sits on the edge of the Leicestershire countryside in the historic village of Kirby Muxloe. Rooms retain period features and each includes a flat-screen TV. The Castle Hotel by Good Night Inns offers 19 beautifully decorated en suite rooms, all with a Freeview TV, tea/coffee and ironing facilities, and a hairdryer. The hotel includes a popular Chef and Brewer restaurant, with weekly specials created by the head chef. Food is accompanied by a carefully chosen but extensive wine list. One of Kirby Castle’s ancient towers was demolished in the 18th century, with some of the bricks then used in the repair of the Castle farmhouse, adding to the hotel’s character and historical charm. Guests at the Castle are just 5 minutes’ drive from junction 21A of the M1 motorway.

name: OYO Shilton Inn
description: Situated on the A47, in the centre of Earl Shilton between Leicester and Hinckley, this hotel has convenient links to the M69, M1 and M6 motorways. Free parking is available on site. Free WiFi is accessible in all rooms and public areas. All bedrooms have en-suite showers and flat screen TV. The Hotel is centrally located and within 500 metres of shop, pubs and restaurants. There is a supermarket directly opposite. Located south-west of Leicester, the hotel is well placed for Mallory Park motor racing circuit and a 10-minute drive to Bosworth Battlefields, Bradgate Country Historical Park and the Stoney Cove the National Diving Centre. The NEC and National Space Centre are within a 30-minute drive away. Magna Park Distrubution Centre is a 20-minute drive away.

name: The Star Inn 1744
description: With freshly cooked food and a selection of real ales, The Star Inn dates back to the 18th century. It is situated in Thrussington, a charming village on the River Wreake, and offers free Wi-Fi throughout. Open all day, the restaurant serves tea, coffee and snacks from 9:00 – 5:00. Continental breakfast is provided each morning, full English options are available, and there are a range of traditional pub favourites for lunch and dinner. Rooms at The Star are spacious and sleek, with wooden furnishings. Each comes with a flat-screen TV, facilities for making tea and coffee, and a tiled bathroom with a hairdryer. The building is located north of Leicester, just off the Old Fosse Way, the only Roman road in Britain that has kept its original Latin name. The centre of Nottingham can be reached in 30 minutes by car.

name: Rothley Court Hotel by Greene King Inns
description: Set in a magnificent estate, Rothley Court Hotel boasts idyllic, manicured grounds and wonderful period features. The stunning, 10-acre grounds feature a trout-filled river, rose walks and an 11th-century chapel. The beautiful bedrooms each have a modern bathroom and free Wi-Fi access. Some rooms overlook the gardens, and all have a flat-screen TV/DVD player and music system. Tea/coffee facilities are also provided. The intimate Babington Restaurant serves an extensive menu and carefully selected wine list. Speciality coffees and afternoon teas are served daily in the Babington Bar, which has real log fires. With pretty flower gardens, heated terraces and fountains, the impressive estate of Rothley Court dates back to 1086. There is free on-site parking and a 24-hour front desk. With a picturesque village location in Rothley, the hotel is just 8 miles north of historic Leicester. Great Central Steam Railway is half a mile away, and the National Space Centre is a 10-minute drive.

name: Sketchley Grange Hotel & Spa
description: Sketchley Grange Hotel is an elegant country house hotel, ideally located on the borders of East and West Midlands in the town of Hinckley, 2 minutes' drive from the M69. This stylish 4-star hotel and spa is ideally located in a rural setting on the borders of Leicestershire and Warwickshire. The National Exhibition Centre (NEC) is 24 miles away, and Birmingham International Airport is just 30 minutes drive away. The superb Romans Health Club, including a 17 meter swimming pool with bubble jet bath, sauna, aromatic steam room, spa bath, whirlpool spa and gym is available to use at a charge of £10.00 per person per stay. The hotel also has a beauty therapy and hair salon, offering a wide range of treatments in the most luxurious surroundings. The award-winning Garden Restaurant serves fine cuisine in beautiful surroundings. Alternatively guests can relax in the informal, contemporary Garden Lounge Bar, with a cosmopolitan menu and friendly service. There is a children's menu and an outdoor play area. All of the elegantly furnished bedrooms are en suite, with Freeview TV and free WiFi access throughout.

name: Fieldhead Hotel by Greene King Inns
description: Originally built as a farmhouse in 1672, the Fieldhead is situated on the edge of Charnwood Forest, just 7 miles from Leicester and 1 mile from Junction 22 of the M1. Built from local stone, this charming traditional inn was a working farm until the 1980s. Now, it has a cosy restaurant, a bar and a terrace for guests to enjoy. The seasonal menus offer a wide selection of modern and traditional British favourites, from hearty main courses to lighter snacks. A selection of real ales, carefully selected wines and special teas and coffees are also available. The hotel offers 28 comfortable en suite rooms, each of which is individually decorated with its own unique charm. Guests can make use of free Wi-Fi in the hotel rooms and in public areas of the building. The National Space Centre, Donnington Park and Museum, and East Midlands Airport are all within a 20-minute drive of the hotel.

name: Hilton Leicester Hotel
description: Stay at the Hilton Leicester Hotel located 3 miles from the city center and just off junction 21 of the M1. Hilton Leicester Hotel is just a 25-minute drive from East Midlands Airport. Indulge in traditional cuisine at our Flavours restaurant or a light lunch and cool drink at The Court Bar. We also serve coffee and sandwiches at The Coffee Lounge. Unwind in the LivingWell Health Club, swim in the indoor pool, work out in the gym or relax in the sauna. Nearby Leicester attractions include Leicester City Football Club, Leicester Racecourse and Fosse Shopping Park. Take the whole family on a day trip to Alton Towers Resorts or Drayton Manor. We offer complimentary WiFi in public areas, and our 10 meeting rooms can fit groups of up to 150 guests. The hotel operates chargeable car parking at GBP 6 per night for overnight Guests. Parking is protected with CCTV, entry and exit barriers and utilises ANPR recognition.Hilton

name: Holiday Inn Express Leicester - City, An IHG Hotel
address: Filbert Way, Raw Dykes Road, Leicester, LE2 7FL
description: A modern hotel next door to King Power Stadium, home to Leicester City Football Club, with free Wi-Fi, free parking and breakfast included Holiday Inn Express® Leicester City hotel is five minutes' drive from the city centre. There are direct trains to London from Leicester station, less than two miles away. The M1 and M69 motorways are both within 15 minutes' drive, and East Midlands Airport (EMA) is half an hour away by car. You can host a meeting in the hotel's three modern conference rooms, which have space for up to 40 people. The hotel is less than a mile from both the University of Leicester and De Montfort University, and walking distance from many important city-centre businesses. Head to the international racing circuit, Silverstone, in just 45 minutes. If you prefer history, the King Richard III Visitor Centre is five minutes' drive away. For another educational adventure, take the kids to the National Space Centre, 10 minutes by car from the hotel. Highcross Shopping Centre, just over a mile away, has more than 100 stores and a 12-screen cinema. Sit down in the morning to the included Express Start Breakfast buffet, with scrambled eggs, beans and sausages, plus continental items. There's a bar and grill restaurant attached to the hotel, and you can relax after a day of meetings with a cool beer in the modern bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Croft Hotel
description: Croft Hotel is a classic Victorian building set on the outskirts of Leicester. Just 7 minutes’ drive from the city centre, this former school has a 24-hour front desk, a TV area, free on-site parking and a bar. Each contemporary room is delicately decorated and features a TV, free WiFi, tea and coffee making facilities and a radio. Within the newly refurbished on-site bar, an assortment of draught beers, bottles and soft drinks are available. Close to many of Leicester’s major attractions, Croft Hotel is just a 9-minute drive from the National Space Centre. Haymarket shopping centre is a 6-minute car journey from the hotel, and guests can also journey through medieval England at Bosworth Battlefield, also just 37 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Brooklyn Leicester
description: Brand New hotel with bold Urban design and modern luxury feel, with a modern twist there is a touch of old Brooklyn throughout its design, it provides a perfect place to stay for work or leisure and allows you to experience the city in whichever direction you choose. All 192 en-suite bedrooms and suites have an urban feel with simplicity and sensory aesthetic experience.iHotelier/iStay

name: Charnwood Lodge
description: Ideally located in the Loughborough Hastings area, Charnwood Lodge promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Car park, restaurant, laundry service, bar are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Charnwood Lodge caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Kirkby House
description: Located in the village of Kirkby Mallory in rural Leicestershire, Mallories Formerly Kirkby House offers a farmhouse-style dining room serving freshly cooked food. Secure private parking and Wi-Fi are free, and the lounge area comes with leather sofas and a feature fireplace. The city of Leicester is within a 30-minute drive whilst Nottingham and Birmingham are less than an hour away. Kirkby Mallory race track is just 2 minutes by foot, whilst the popular diving location of Stoney Cove and the historic Bosworth battlefield can both be reached within 30 minutes by car. All rooms come equipped with a flat-screen TV, and most come with an en suite bathroom. The spacious Deluxe Suite is decorated using natural colours and wooden furnishings, and features a large spa bath and fireplace, as well as a bidet. Mallories Formerly Kirkby House’s ever-changing menu offers everything from light snacks to a full three-course meal. The fully licensed bar serves a good selection of wines, beers and spirits. Both the bar and restaurant are closed on Sundays.

name: Grafton House
description: Situated on the outskirts of Leicester city centre, the Grafton House is just 5 minutes’ walk from Leicester Railway Station. It offers free Wi-Fi throughout and a bar. The Grafton House offers rooms which include a Freeview TV and share bathroom facilities. No breakfast is currenty offered. Dishes are served alongside a selection of cereals, fruit juice, and tea and coffee. Numerous restaurants, shops, and nightclubs can be found in lively central Leicester. Along with smaller boutique stores, the Highcross Shopping Centre is just 1 mile away. Leicester offers a wide range of attractions, many of which are within walking distance of the Grafton House. The De Montfort Hall is just 8 minutes’ walk away and the New Walk Museum is just a 5-minute stroll. Leicester Tigers Rugby Club is a 15-minute walk from the house.

name: Narborough Arms
description: Just 15 minutes’ drive from Leicester’s centre, The Narborough Arms is friendly pub dating back to the 17th century. It offers traditional inn style rooms and boasts free on-site parking. The comfortable rooms at Narborough Arms are conveniently positioned above the pub. Each room includes an en-suite bathroom, a flat-screen TV, and tea and coffee making facilities. Some rooms boast original features. Hearty food is served in the pub restaurant each day. The bar offers regular entertainment and a lively atmosphere, and serves a range of beers, wines, and drinks. Just 3 minutes’ walk away, Narborough Rail Station runs to Birmingham and Leicester. The M1 motorway can be reached in less than 5 minutes ‘ drive, and the village includes 2 shopping centres.

name: Mill On The Soar by Greene King Inns
description: Located in Broughton Astley, Mill On The Soar occupies 5 acres of Leicestershire countryside and boasts 2 rivers and a fishing lake within its grounds. It features a large garden with a children's playground and a terrace, as well as an on-site bar and a restaurant. Public parking facilities are available free of charge. Rooms at Mill On The Soar have contemporary design and each comes with a TV and tea and coffee making facilities, as well as a private bathroom fitted with a bathtub, a shower and a hairdryer. A wholesome breakfast is served every morning. Fine cuisine is served in the common dining area. The hotel also proposes fireplace dining and a well-stocked bar with a variety of wines and spirits. Guests can unwind on the property's Millstream garden patio or make use of the 300-seater family patio, equipped with a playground and a children's adventure zone. The city of Leicester is located 24 km from the accommodation and Birmingham is a 30-minute drive away.

name: Ramada Encore by Wyndham Leicester City Centre
description: The Ramada Encore Leicester City Centre is a superb stylish hotel in Leicester within easy walking distance to the train station and city centre. The striking, contemporary hotel is next to the Curve theatre and is certain to be a popular choice. With spacious modern bedrooms, all with a walk in shower, the rooms have a modern and clean feel with everything you need, whether you are visiting for business or leisure. On the ground floor is a bar and bistro restaurant opening on to Halford Street. Food and drink will be served all day ranging from paninis and sandwiches to pasta dishes and steaks and Julius Meinl is served at the bar. A modern and open area with two flat screen TVs and lounge to relax in. The Ramada Encore Hotel Leicester City Centre will be a great base for your stay in Leicester with good road and airport links and central for exploring central England. With inspirational shopping in Leicesters transformed city centre and also boasting Europes largest open air covered market, there is also museums, Curve theatre, and gallerys to visit as well as the Great Central Railway steam train. For sightseeing there is Melton Mowbray and Bosworth nearby, with Belvoir and Ashby de la Zouch Castles making the perfect choice for a day out for all the family. If you are a car racing fan then the Donnington Grand Prix Collection is a must see for all enthusiasts. The Ramada Encore Hotel Leicester City Centre offers free Wi-Fi Internet Access and hard-wired internet access. NCP car parking is available approximately 30 yards away with concessionary charges for guests at Ramada Encore Leicester. Alternatively, the hotel has a limited number of exclusive parking spaces available underneath the hotel, charged at 20 pounds Sterling per day. Please contact the hotel directly to book these, subject to availability.Wyndham

name: The Plough Inn Wigston
description: Situated in Wigston Magna, 5.4 km from University of Leicester, The Plough Inn Wigston features accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a bar. Located around 6.6 km from De Montfort University, the inn with free WiFi is also 6.9 km away from Leicester Railway Station. Belgrave Road is 8.8 km from the inn and Kelmarsh Hall is 29 km away. At the inn, the rooms have a patio. All rooms in The Plough Inn Wigston are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. You can play darts at the accommodation, and the area is popular for cycling. Donington Park is 41 km from The Plough Inn Wigston, while FarGo Village is 41 km from the property. The nearest airport is East Midlands Airport, 37 km from the inn.

name: The Broadway Rooms
description: No description found
